<=
( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT index_source) FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE index_name = 'activeNum' AND stat_time = CONCAT (#{startDate}, '-01') AND stat_time_span = 'M' ) ORDER BY T1.INDEX_VALUE DESC
